text: "Saturday in the Park" is a 1972 song by Chicago. It was taken from their fourth studio album Chicago V and went to number 3 in the United States, number 2 in Canada and number 43 in Australia. It did not chart in the United Kingdom and New Zealand. == References == Category:1972 songs Category:Chicago (band) songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Saturday in the Park (song)
